item.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud - Elevating Runtime Protection
item.description: In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, runtime security is crucial for maintaining the integrity of applications in containerized environments. As threats become increasingly sophisticated, the demand for more adaptive protection continues to rise. Attackers are no longer relying on generic exploits — they are actively targeting vulnerabilities in container configurations, runtime processes, and shared resources.
